scripts.stream:setup: bash initialize.sh && yarn stream:dependencies && yarn install
scripts.stream:dependencies: cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && soroban contract bindings typescript --wasm ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/soroban_vote_contract.wasm --id $(cat ./.soroban-vote-dapp/vote_id) --output-dir ../packages/votedapp-client --network $(cat ./.soroban-vote-dapp/network)
